article: I have two pen pals. One is from Canada . Her name is Jessica. She lives _ her parents in Toronto. She is _ outgoing  and smart girl .She likes singing and _ .Chinese music is her favorite. So she often writes letters to me to talk _ Chinese music. The other _ from Tokyo .She is a _ girl .She keeps many cats at home, _ she likes little animals so much. In her letters, she often tells me about her pets and interesting Japanese cartoons .I often write to her _ Chinese, because she is _ Chinese by herself.
